对常见各类型代码字符串进行语法高亮展示。.en-us: Syntax highlighting for common code string types.

配合参数`removedLineNumbers`、`addedLineNumbe.en-us: Pair with the parameters `removedLineNumbers` and `addedLineNumbers` to implement code diff effects.

基于参数`startingLineNumber`设置起始行号。.en-us: Based on the parameter `startingLineNumber` to set the starting line number.
